metaTitle: MoodMap — Understand the cycle. Survive the chaos.
metaDescription: MoodMap helps you track and survive the hormonal cycle with clarity, humor, and daily guidance for staying connected—and sane.

hero.title: Understand the cycle. Survive the chaos.
hero.description: MoodMap helps you track and survive the hormonal cycle with clarity, humor, and daily guidance for staying connected—and sane.

cta.subnote: Private by design • Cancel anytime • Works on iOS & Android

about.heading: About MoodMap
about.body: Built for men who want to thrive—not tiptoe—through the hormonal cycle. Get brutally honest survival cues, timing windows, and a visual code so you can bring warmth when it matters and space when it saves the day.

cycleOverview.title: Cycle Overview
cycleOverview.body: Map the mood. Crack the code. No guessing.

survivalAlerts.title: Survival Alerts
survivalAlerts.body: Know when to lean in, back off — or bring chocolate.

tipsIntimacy.title: Tips & Intimacy
tipsIntimacy.body: Blunt advice + playful nudges to keep the spark (and sex) alive.

selfcards.title: Selfcards
selfcards.body: Daily rituals to sharpen presence — show up solid, for her and for you.
